short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever wanted to roll a dice and couldn't find one? Now you have it with you all the time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wanted to roll a dice and couldn't find one? Now you have it with you all the time.
Quickly roll one dice or more, right off from your extension bar.
